snippet: “The Gershwins’ Porgy and Bess” has informed group-sales agents that the show will play until Sept. 30, as concerns over the production’s artistic experimentation have not hurt the box office.
abstract: “The Gershwins’ Porgy and Bess” has informed group-sales agents that the show will play until Sept. 30, as concerns over the production’s artistic experimentation have not hurt the box office.

headline.main: With Box Office Strong, 'Porgy and Bess' to Extend Its Run
